video.title: You're All Surrounded
video.synopsis: This drama series follows a new batch of rookie detectives and their temperamental chief, who fight crime in the upper-crust Gangnam area of Seoul.

episodes.synopsis: A group of high school kids tussle over love, loyalty and family issues; one student's mother faces the risks of standing up as a witness to a crime.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Rookie detectives in the Gangnam police force blow a case. Veteran Seo Pan Seok wants them fired -- especially Kim Sa Kyeong -- for reasons of his own.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Pan Seok puts the rookie detectives to the test; Soo Seon and Dae Gu let their personal problems interfere with their work, and it causes a disaster.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Frustrated over their screw-up, Soo Seon and Dae Gu get into a fist-fight; the four rookies lunch at a restaurant where a customer takes them hostage.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Dae Gu overhears Pan Seok talk to a voice he can never forget; the rookies start to find their way; issues between the police and prosecutors emerge.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: When Sy Keong opens up to Pan Seok, he punches Prosecutor Han and goes to jail, so the rookies must earn their stripes by helping to catch the crook.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: When her mother visits Seoul, Soo Seon pretends to be living with the boys; Pan Seok admits his feelings for Sa Kyeong; Dae Gu's cover could be blown.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Pan Seok and Sa Kyeong go on a date; Dae Gu comes to a crossroads in his career; Gook has a secret; Pan Seok realizes Ji Yong is still alive.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Dae Gu is advised not to take justice into his own hands; Pan Seok and Sa Kyeong's romance buds; Pan Seok performs a test to see if Dae Gu is Ji Yong.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Flashbacks show Soo Seon giving a detective vital information, but Kang plays a dark role; Dae Gu is torn about trusting Pan Seok's version of events.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Boots attacks Dae Gu. Pan Seok recognizes the offender but is ordered off the case. The team fears Dae Gu will take justice into his own hands.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Chief Kang warns prisoner Jo Hyung Chul to keep quiet; Pan Seok has an epiphany about the school nurse murder; Soo Seon’s mother's mistake goes viral.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: The detectives try to help Soo Seon and her mother; Pan Seok feels pangs of jealousy; Yoo Ae Yeon is shocked to see that Ji Yong is still alive.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Soo Seon chafes at the chief’s request to bury the case; Yoo Gi Jae is impressed with Dae Gu and gives him a clue; Soo Seon's mother gets an apology.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Dae Gu and Soo Seon kiss on the job; Pan Seok looks into Soo Seon’s statement in Masan; Dae Gu discovers the pendant Soo Seon kept all these years.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: The owner of the pendant is revealed; Pan Seok and Dae Gu go to Masan to find witnesses; Pan Seok uncovers Chief Kang's past; Tai II gets stabbed.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Dae Gu visits Jo Hyung Chul in prison to ask why Yoo Ae Yeon had his mother killed; the team looks for ways to find Yoo Ae Yeon's weak spot.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Yoo Ae Yeon admits to murder; Jo Hyung Chul commits suicide and leaves Dae Gu a recording; Chief Kang continues on her shady and treacherous path.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: When Chief Kang is hospitalized, Dae Gu reminisces about her kindness; Yoo Ae Yeon is wrongly accused of murder; Seo Pan Seok breaks his ethical code.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Yoo Moon Bae claims his innocence; Dae Gu figures out that Yoo Moon Bae’s orders were recorded; Dae Gu is torn between his duty and his emotions.
episodes.title: Episode 20
